backend/main.mo: Defines the actor’s data types for moods, chat, analytics, market metadata, and storage, including comparison helpers and domain models.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old actor state to a new empty state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing feature IDs, affected frontend files, components, and test references for recent changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of numerous frontend components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variable definitions and theme styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the frontend root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, profile loading, navigation, session tracking, and rendering routed views.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserDrilldo: Fetches and displays detailed analytics for a specific user, including metadata, mood stats, and tabbed views such as mood history. Handles loading, error states, and navigation back to the main dashboard.
Shows a user’s mood entries in calendar and chart formats with selectable views and detailed daily entries. Provides alerts when no mood data is available.
frontend/src/components/AIChat.tsx: AI chat interface handling message history, session context, and AI response generation with sessionStorage persistence.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsDashboa: Admin dashboard showing aggregated analytics, user lists, and drilldown navigation into individual user data. Handles admin checks, loading states, errors, and data refresh.
frontend/src/components/AnonymousLogin.t: Handles guest and Internet Identity login flows, including profile setup, error handling, and login activity logging. Manages multi‑step authentication UI and submits user profile data.
frontend/src/components/AppMarketSetting: Provides UI for viewing and updating app marketplace metadata and pricing settings. Loads existing config, allows edits, and saves changes via mutation hooks.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoom.tsx: Displays chat messages for a room, handles sending messages, auto‑scrolling, and message refreshing.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatRoomDi: Dialog for creating a new chat room with name and topic selection, submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing app intro, date display, chat room lists, and dialogs for creating or starting chats.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar with user info, logout, and adaptive nav items including admin options.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyMoodTrend: Generates weekly mood averages for the current month and displays them as a bar chart.
frontend/src/components/MoodCalendar.tsx: Renders a month or week calendar of mood entries with emoji and color indicators and allows selecting days with logged moods.
frontend/src/components/MoodEditor.tsx: Provides a form to create or edit a mood entry for a specific date, loading existing data and saving updates through mutations.
frontend/src/components/MoodHistory.tsx: Displays mood history with charts and a calendar, handles errors, and opens the mood editor when a date is selected.
frontend/src/components/MoodTracker.tsx: Allows users to log their current mood with notes and saves entries using backend mutations with permission and error handling.
frontend/src/components/OverallMoodTrend: Generates monthly average mood scores and renders them as a bar chart to show long-term trends.
frontend/src/components/PresentationView: Displays a slide-based presentation with navigation controls and thumbnail previews.
frontend/src/components/PrivateChat.tsx: Renders a private chat UI that fetches, displays, and sends messages within a thread, including auto-scrolling and error handling.
frontend/src/components/StartPrivateChat: Dialog for creating a new private chat thread by entering another user's principal and invoking the create-thread mutation.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodInsigh: Displays weekly mood insights including summaries, clusters, and anomalies with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodSummar: Computes and displays the current week's average mood score, label, and insight based on mood history.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodTrendl: Generates a weekly mood trendline chart with daily averages, emojis, and a linear regression line.
frontend/src/hooks/guestAuthStore.ts: Manages guest session state with localStorage persistence and pub‑sub updates, including session migration and UUID generation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActivityLogging.ts: Provides hooks to log user or guest activity events via actor calls, including login, navigation, and interaction logs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity state and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestAuth.ts: Provides guest session state, subscription to guestAuthStore, and functions for guest login and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing auth client creation, login, logout, and reactive identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations on moods, profiles, messages, analytics, and other backend calls using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionTracking.ts: Tracks user session duration and reports it periodically or on unload via backend or sendBeacon.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind and defines extensive OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/ai/constraints.ts: Defines response safety constraints and validation helpers for diagnosis checks, therapy claims, reflective language, and permission phrases.
frontend/src/lib/ai/generator.ts: Generates AI responses by selecting stages and templates, applying constraints, adding crisis messaging, validating output, and updating session context.
frontend/src/lib/ai/routing.ts: Implements conversation stage selection based on message content and context, including crisis detection logic. Also updates session context with themes, goals, and technique requests.
frontend/src/lib/ai/sessionContext.ts: Manages session context storage in sessionStorage and provides helpers to load, save, clear, and summarize context.
frontend/src/lib/ai/templates.ts: Defines stage-specific response templates and follow-up questions for all conversation stages.
frontend/src/lib/ai/templateUtils.ts: Selects and adapts response templates based on session context, optionally adding follow-up questions and mirroring user language.
frontend/src/lib/ai/types.ts: Declares types for conversation stages, session context, constraints, and structured stage responses.
frontend/src/lib/linearRegression.ts: Provides a simple least-squares linear regression utility returning slope, intercept, and a predict function.
frontend/src/lib/moodErrors.ts: Classifies errors into availability, permission, or unknown categories by inspecting error text.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Converts between Date objects and nanosecond timestamps, and provides helpers for formatting and normalizing dates.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/weeklySummaryText.ts: Maps weekly mood averages to descriptive labels and generates simple insights and empty-state messages.
frontend/src/lib/weekUtils.ts: Generates week-based date calculations such as week start/end, day lists, index lookup, and formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended frontend-facing types mirroring backend models for moods, users, analytics, and summaries.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, border radii, and animations, and enabling plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project rollback requirements, existing features, and pending requests for restoring version 99 behavior.
